net.proteusframework.cms.component.generator

Interface Renderer<T extends PageElement>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the datasource type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DelegateRenderer<T>, Generator<T>, ScriptGenerator<G>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScriptGenerator, CmsIntegration, DelegateGenerator, GeneratorImpl, HTMLBoxGenerator, HTMLPageGenerator, MIWTGenerator, MIWTRenderer, PageSyndicationGenerator, PassthroughGenerator, SequentialGenerator, XMLGenerator, XMLRenderer

    public interface Renderer<T extends PageElement>
    Renderer for content.

    It is guaranteed that the following methods will called in the order listed.

    • preRenderProcess
    • getNDEs
    • render

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> getNDEs()
      Get the NDEs needed by the generated content.
      void preRenderProcess(CmsRequest<T> request, CmsResponse response, ProcessChain chain)
      Process the request.

      Render the response.

    • Method Detail

      • getNDEs

        List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> getNDEs()
        Get the NDEs needed by the generated content.

        The NDEs should be assembled in the preRenderProcess method. See the class level javadoc for order of method calls. The ProcessChain will gather the NDEs of any Renderers or PageElements that are delegated to.

        Returns:
        the NDEs.

      • preRenderProcess

        void preRenderProcess(CmsRequest<T> request,
                    CmsResponse response,
                    ProcessChain chain)
        Process the request. Smart implementations should check to see if anything needs to be done before doing any work.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        chain - the process chain.

      • render

        void render(CmsRequest<T> request,
          CmsResponse response,
          RenderChain chain)
            throws IOException
        Render the response.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        chain - the render chain.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs rendering.
